website_summaries.verdict: A popular blender with a host of accessories, although some who purchased it had issues with the power and durability.
pros: Comes in your choice of green, red, or silver finishes
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
11-piece set includes 3 different kinds of cup, lids, and recipe book
cons: Some claims that it doesn't work well for ice, frozen fruits, or other harder items

customer_reviews.title: This thing does horrible with ice
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this if you wish to make smoothies... This thing does horrible with ice.... it takes me at least 5-10 minutes to make an 8oz smoothie because the blade is not sharp enough to cut the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Started making hiss noise within 1 month of usage
customer_reviews.text: Blender has been probably used <10 times in the last 2 months. started making hiss noise and can smell as if something is burning. Such a cheap product. dont buy this
customer_reviews.author: praneeth_b

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i can only operate the item today and that s*** is burned, almost burn me actually
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this will be perfect - it can blend a few ice cubes with
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nutri Bullet that all of a sudden stopped working so I purchased this as an inexpensive replacement. - if you are expecting a Nutri Bullet, this is not an exact replacement! It is much smaller and clearly not as strong of a motor - if you are looking for an inexpensive blender to make smoothies or shakes, this will be perfect - it can blend a few ice cubes with, say, a banana, some PB, and milk, pretty easily. Any more than that and I could see the motor dying quickly Other than that, I say it’s worth what you pay and it’s a great small blender for making smoothies
customer_reviews.author: HSL

customer_reviews.title: Check your items when you receive them
customer_reviews.text: I received the product but didn’t open it because it’s a present. Just opened today and the recipe book not in box along with 2 stay fresh resealable lids.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kissiday

customer_reviews.title: can't crush ice!?
customer_reviews.text: I Specifically bought this because it claims to blend ANYTHING in 30 seconds..I blended this shake for almost 5 minutes and STILL had these HUGE chunks (pictured) and a ton of smaller one's. I am using this in a work break room and the nose is so disruptive...I had a $15 blender that worked better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Motor went out less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas. All I made in it was green smoothies. Twice a day. That is it. It's now March 6th and the motor has went out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Is trash
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one if this before and it lasted for a long time so now that I got it to making shakes I bough this one just for shake no ice no fruit nothing only the power I was putting in the second time I used it started to come a lot of smoke from under the motor I carefully unplug it and in the trash it went , rather to lose $30 then set the house on fire was very scary.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work. After one successful blend ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. After one successful blend, I couldn't get the power to engage again. I have owned a magic bullet in the past and had this problem after several years of use. But this one failed me right out of the gate.
customer_reviews.author: dizzylizzy

customer_reviews.title: Thr Magic Bullet works great and is very handy
customer_reviews.text: Thr Magic Bullet works great and is very handy. The only drawback is that it does not come with an ice crusher blade. I selected this one because it was cheaper than Target but now I know why. I ordered the extra blade from Amazon for myself and my daughter. We use it daily for smoothies. Great in the summer for a quick meal because you do not have to dirty a big blender. It washes well in the dishwasher and I like the cup option.
customer_reviews.author: diane d'alba

customer_reviews.title: No frozen smoothies for me
customer_reviews.text: I make frozen fruit smoothies in the morning for breakfast in my Ninja but wanted something smaller that I could leave on the counter instead of pulling out and putting away my massive Ninja every morning. This thing has NO BLENDING POWER. It couldn't handle the frozen fruit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: this product was poorly constructed, i was super excited to start hitting a smoothly kick and the grinder bottom wore out within weeks of starting to use it. all i was grinding was the normal easy smoothly materials and it just wore down so quickly. then i called about the warranty and magic bullet was going to send me a replacement part but i was going to have to pay for shipping. thank goodness for amazon making it right, i am returning this item and getting something more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not AT ALL USEFUL PRODUCT - WASTE
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within 2-3 months. Try your luck. TRASH PRODUCT DONT BUY Also, I called the magicbullet as the motor or part was not working , they are charging for shipping which is almost costing as the unit. So friends, if you wanted to PAY SHIPPING and HANDLING PRICE (which is more than original product) even though you have 1 year WARRANTY , then you can go for this... :) The customer service is rude and not did not help. The company did not even bother to call me back.
customer_reviews.author: Arkay

customer_reviews.title: Great for one person
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son is in football and wanted this to make himself protein shakes. He says he likes it a lot because it is a perfect size for just making one shake on the go. Now if only it would clean itself lol.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Poor Excuse for a Blender
customer_reviews.text: Was not at all impressed with this. I was looking for a small, space saving blender to just make smoothies and protein shakes with ice. This thing claimed it could do “any job in 10 seconds or less”. What a joke. It took several minutes to blend the ice into small chunks, to the point where I could smell the motor burning with effort. It never got the ice completely smooth. I suppose if you pre-crush the ice it might work. Overall quality seemed fine, but functionality gets 2/10.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easily best single juicer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Easily best single juicer on the market! (around this price point of course) I have been using it for one week;it is exact the same as my old Magic Bullet Juicer except my old one has two medium cups + 1 large cup w/o the tiny blender cup. Other than that, the blade/motor/functionality is perfect for a daily juicer. I highly recommend not to over-stuff the cup as if you do it it will leak. Fill it up to 80% to the cup and it will do the trick. And also don't let it run more than 20-30 seconds continuously.
customer_reviews.author: kaya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, started leaking plastic in blend
customer_reviews.text: What ever I tried to blend, it left pieces, didn't get a smooth paste. After using it for a month, suddenly something black started getting mixed in the blend, realized it is the plastic from the base, I contacted for support and haven't gotten any!!!!
customer_reviews.author: achillez

customer_reviews.title: If I could give a 0 I would.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I don’t like to leave negative reviews but I have to make an exception. This magic bullet is horrible it’s not as good as a regular blender my mom the Walmart version is way better that this don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mariela d

customer_reviews.title: I would go with a more expensive brand like NutriBullet or a Ninja if you are a hardcore ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well if you want to blend anything frozen. I tried to mix my protein smoothies with frozen banana pieces and it literally started smoking and died. Works well for all soft and liquefied mixtures though. I would go with a more expensive brand like NutriBullet or a Ninja if you are a hardcore blender user though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Burn $30
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item less than one month ago and used it four times. In each instance, serving cups of milk, berries, and peanut butter have to be blended, then re-blended, then re-blended. The most recent attempt ended with pouring the same contents into a different blender. The base emits an electrical odor and light "smoke" from time to time as if gears or parts are misaligned or the entire product was damaged. Obviously not one I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for my bulletproof coffee, and have used it only one or two other times in the two and a half months since i bought it. It has already started to leak: after approximately 75 uses. This is not satisfactory; the use has not been hard. The previous one I bought lasted 2-3 years. As far as I can tell, all the replacement parts (blades, gaskets) are all aftermarket, and reviews mention poor fit, etc. I guess i'll just have to buy a small immersion blender instead for my morning coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ewr

customer_reviews.title: blender is broken
customer_reviews.text: I literally received the blender this week, on Tuesday to be precise. My second time of using this blender is today (05/16/2020) and it's already broken. I read reviews before placing the order and I should've followed by instincts. I almost never write reviews but I felt the need to do so today as I am extremely disappointment. I have also never bought anything on Amazon that messed this quick.
customer_reviews.author: theresa attoh

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: We used this blender for a breakfast smoothie for about one month and it smells like it is burning from the inside of the base. The odor fills the whole room. Even after not using it for several weeks it still smells like fire. Nutribullet customer service says it just needs a new blade, which they will send me for $4.99 even though it is under warranty for a year. A blade will not stop this from catching on fire and burning down the house. This is completely unusable. Since purchasing I have read many other reviews with this same problem. I would not recommend this fire hazard to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: We use it every day. Love those smoothies fast. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: WE absolutely love this little wonder. My entire family uses it daily. We love smoothies and salsa. Just drop a few bananas , strawberries and yogurt or milk and ice and its deliciousness in seconds. it works great and its safe for all ages. I highly recommend it. great price too. Its the original invention. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Mixer... Not a blend
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm spoiled, cause I have a vitamix. I didn't expect this thing to live up to a vitamix, but I did expect it to be a blender.... cause that what it claims to be. But it's not! In the beginning, It would blend most of the frozen fruit that I put in but not all. And now, maybe 6 months later the motor seems to be failing, getting less and less powerful. I guess I got what I paid for. Good thing it's cheap. If your going to use this thing regularly look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MG73

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same product over two years ago and have been very happy. Old model was 2.6 lbs , new model is 1.7 lbs, so obviously they've cheapen them up. It also smells hot like burning electrical wires within 5 seconds of use. It also didn't come with the larger pitcher as the first one I purchased did. I purchased two of these one for my mother also. I will be returning these items. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Leaking some fluid into food
customer_reviews.text: It leaks some kind of a chemical from the bottom into the baby food. At first I thought it’s was all the fruit mixtures or food mixes but today I just used apple alone and it discolor the apple. Don’t know what this is. I hope my baby is ok. I have been using this for more than a month for my baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Bad product manufacturing - the blade doesn't attach
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered it and opened it to clean before use... SHOCKED to see that the blade came off and then I tried to screw the black thingy back to the blade ... the screw diameter and the diameter of the hole in the black thingy were DIFFERENT!.... Very disappointed ... Magic Buffet manufacturers: You have a great product ... why are you spoiling your good name and Amazon's good name by giving such carelessly and cheaply manufactured products??? I will be talking to the Amazon people to return this.
customer_reviews.author: yep

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: Was so ready for this as a replacement for my older model but, could not be more disappointed. The noise and odor was immediately noticeable not to mention the way it bounced around. Dropped in strawberry's, diced apple, diced celery and coconut water and all it did was grind a bit of strawberry. Returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: LEA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a waste of $36. Can’t even blend a banana with some strawberries or make guacamole! I had to sit there and shake the blender to distribute the contents. Took like 5 minutes to blend. The motor gets hot quickly and starts to smell. Also, this thing is loud. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t deal purchasing protection on this thing it won’t do anything for you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in February, didn’t use it much. But just two days ago it stopped working. I tried to contact the seller because I paid insurance for it. And guess what they ask me to contact the manufacturer! Like why the heck did I bother paying little extra for protection if you can’t help me with fixing this thing that I barely got to use! In this case I would’ve gone and bought it from the actual magic blender site!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a magic chef instead
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this blender to anyone. use the cheaper brand, magic chef. I owned a magic chef for a number of years and when it stopped working, I thought I would get a magic bullet to see what all the hype was about. Waste of money. I wish I had kept the box so that I could ship it back. I hate this blender. It doesn't blender properly. There are large chunks. Sometimes it just doesn't blend at all. I like blending ginger which I use to blend all the time with my magic chef. Even when I cut in small chunks, this blender can't blend it. Save your money. DON'T BUY THIS BLENDER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome. Glad to have it.
customer_reviews.text: In Video Making Mango Smoothie from Mango Chunks and Apple Juice. Makes Good Smoothies with Frozen Fruits. Fresh Blueberries turned into a Jello. But Fresh Strawberry and BlackBerry were good. Just straight Blueberries made the Jello. I Also been Making Fresh Tomato Sauce from Cherry Tomatoes. It can be like a paste or liguid depending on how much Water. I not Sure bout Noise Level of Small Blenders. Just know wouldn't use this like past 12am that why the 3star for Noise Level. Glad I have this Cause I have no Teeth and it makes my life easier. Also I recommend defrosting frozen berries a little.
customer_reviews.author: Magan Storm

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2 magic bullets previously and they both lasted 4+ years. The one I purchased in 2018 started having a weird smell this week then stopped working. Just ordered a nutribullet to try my luck with that instead. If that fails me I’ll be switching brands. I strictly use this for my toddlers smoothies very rarely with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power. Broke after a week.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for a good smoothie blender and it worked great for a week...but then the motor smoked after making 4 smoothies. Complete garbage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Better than getting a Baby Bullet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to toss into a diaper bag and take with us to blend food for our baby whenever needed0. We figured, why keep worrying about taking food/keeping it cold during trips when we can just blend some of the fresh food we buy for ourselves and give it to the baby. Sure, for twice the price you get the extra little bottles and the smiling face print but there is no real benefit to them. Great for what we need it for but if you are looking for a real blender, you should be looking at >600W motors anyway.
customer_reviews.author: GeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Only works with a ton of liquid
customer_reviews.text: Not super happy with the blender. Note it works only if you fill half it up with fruit and the other half with liquid. Works best in little batches. Unfortunately it's so small already that not filling it up makes too little (not even a large cups worth). I'm making do with it, yet don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Magic Bullet so we do love it except there is a change in design from original Magic Bullet
customer_reviews.text: I love the magic bullet and use it quite often. Only thing i didnt like was this bullet that i recently purchased, the cups and grinder is slightly larger than the equipment that came with my original Bullet that is over 5+ years. In one aspect, a little disappointed cant use my original equipment but do like that the idea that the company improves over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned out after 1.5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I got this blender mid May. It's the end of June and I've just replaced it with a NutriNinja Pro Complete because the motor on this one pooped out. We used it just about every morning for smoothies with either ice or a frozen banana and it couldn't cut it, sadly. Since I imagine most people plan to use this similarly, I have to recommend against this one. It's nice that all the parts can go in the dishwasher, but that's the case for most single serve blenders, so spend the money on something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: How_dokulele

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: If you just want to make a smoothie with no ice, this will work for you. But i bought this for milkshakes and smoothies but it does not break up the ice at all. I even used frozen fruits and it didn't work for that either. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well at all. Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't blend things well. We bought it for making a smoothy for our son. We would save time taking out our regular blender and washing it verses using this.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Blake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This got sent to the wrong address, but Amazon returned my money promptly. I have had a MB for years, and periodically buy a new one (the old one still works, but it’s a little tired lol). These things are the greatest. I use it every single day. I make keto shakes, cauliflower mash, soups, margaritas, all kinds of things. I’ve owned three in 20 years, the new one the third, the second one still working. The first one would probably still be working, but glass shards were dropped into it and clogged the motor up. It makes an awesome gift for most people. My first one was a Christmas gift from my mom.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for a quick smoothie, protein shake after a work out, and I even use it to mix my pancake batter. cleaning is really easy too because once you're done you can rinse everything off the blade portion clean it and set it to dry and thats it, the cup part washes like the rest of the dishes. Really great if you find yourself using a blender often.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Magic Bullet
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best value I’ve gotten in awhile. Meets all expectations for what I use it for in making protein smoothies with almond milk, protein powder, banana, peanut butter, fiber, and ice. Was using a big Ninga blender in the past and making way more than I needed. The clean up, ease of use, and portion sizes is perfect. Absolutely love this Magic Bullet and am so glad I didn’t spend the $70 -$150 for a Nutribullet or NutraNinga. $30 for what you get can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Wbask6842

customer_reviews.title: Great little appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, long lasting appliance. After 15 years I've replaced my original one, having overfilled a few times. There was a ton of goop down in the motor, so was reafy for a new one. I use it daily for protein powder smoothies, salad dressings, grinding spices and coffee beans to a press grind, whipping cream. But, it will NOT grind well enough to turn kale/fruit into a smooth green smoothie. It will puree salsa into oblivion. Do not grind anything hot. The heat and energy of the grinding will expand in the space and break the seal, flooding the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, loud but blends well
customer_reviews.text: It blends! It’s smaller than I thought it would be, I’m comparing it to the Hamilton Beach single blender. It’s much louder than I’d like it to be and if you’re not careful it’s easy to nick yourself on the bottom blades. Easy to clean but I didn’t need the extra cups. It blends regular ice cubes and frozen fruit with milk, etc. careful filling it up because you’ll take the lid off and make a mess
customer_reviews.author: J. Will

customer_reviews.title: Good blender for the price makes yummy smoothies and pancakes.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this blender for easy and convenient uses. Easy to make pancakes add pancake flower, milk and blend then pour into the pan. Easy cleanups. Make smoothies for the kids and I easy drink from the cup less messy. Turn on for like 30 sec. then turn off shake and turn on again. Dont leave blender on too long. It's not a heavy duty one so dont put big ice inside the blender it's harder for the blender to crush it. Mash the ice smaller when making smoothies. So far so good. Had a few sets of the magic bullets before this was a extra set for smoothies and baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: We love this blender. It doesn’t last forever, but you don’t expect it to at such a low price point. We always keep it on our counter. Super easy for my daughter to use for making her own smoothies. It is loud, but it blends so quickly that the noise isn’t really a problem. I like that it is so easy to clean. We have used it for smoothies, milkshakes, pesto, salsa, whipped cream... Great product.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Do the job - but the food is not as fine as the upper grade one
customer_reviews.text: So apparently there are many differently grades of this product. Although it they look the same, the quality of the food made buy these are different. We bought our old one long time ago from a physical store. It was very good. The food was very fine. This particular one is half cheaper than the one we bought and so the quality. We use these majority to make food for our small son. I just hate to return stuff to Amazon so I kept it and used it. But yeah, do pay attentions on which one you buy. With that saying, it still does the job, just not as fine as the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: King Bee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it... it’s unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for my child who is 4 months old. For few days noticed her food getting black and then see some black liquid coming below the motor. Looks like it’s from the motor. This is a very poor quality product. NEVER BUY IT. Amazon should ban it as it can be very dangerous for small kids. Don’t buy this cheap Chinese product
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for daily smoothies with frozen fruits for my wife and I. If there is any complaint, it is that it overheats a bit if you run it for too long (maybe a minute or two with no stopping) and it cuts off till it cools down. That only happened once to me, and now I pulse it a bit for 30 second intervals. Awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason  Blaseg

customer_reviews.title: Take The Bullet With You When You Travel
customer_reviews.text: I use my Vita Mix when I’m at home to make veg/fruit smoothies, but I was traveling and wanted to be able to make them while I was away. The Bullet was recommended by a friend, so I purchased one to take with me and it worked great. It doesn’t have the power of a Vita Mix, but it liquified the ingredients enough to make my smoothie the consistency I wanted it to be. Now, I take it with me whenever I’ll be away for more than a couple of days. The Bullet travels easily and fits into even the smaller suitcases. I can now enjoy my delicious smoothies when I’m on the road.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shauri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small, fast easy use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Magic Bullet - lost one, gave one away,used one til the motor got tired and the blade bottoms wore down. Since it first came out I have found it to be an absolute necessity. I can't do without it for small portions, fast prep and easy clean up. The design has changed just enough that my new motor will easily accommodate the old (almost worn out blades) from the very first Magic Bullet! And all the older containers still fit perfectly. Great for smoothies, chopping, blending using the appropriate blade. Takes tiny space on the counter. I love this little guy!!!
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: FROZEN FRUITS
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didnt like this product because it would leave frozen chunks of fruit at the bottom. I realized that I wasnt adding enough liquid. I had to fill 1/3 of the cup with fruit and 2/3 with milk. Now its a perfect smoothy :) Love that it's super quiet compared to my cheap livart green blender. It was time to retire that cheap blender. Hello to Magic Bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The only blender I need! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my MB, and it replaced my blender and juicer, just so convenient! Bought this one for my sis for Christmas who wants to do the same thing. You cannot go wrong with the bullet, had it for years and if motor ever poops out, after years of use, can always find a new base on Amazon at an economical price and not need to buy a whole new system! I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jannyce A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for making smoothies every morning and decided based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews but am so very disappointed. Not only does this not blend anything smoothly, it overheats every 3-4 mins and stops working, after which I have to transfer the contents to my bigger blender thus doubling my work. Totally useless unless u have to blend something soft and easy like cooked fruit/veggies. Maybe I got a defective piece but I am frustrated with this product and am returning it asap. I would give this zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I debated on what brand to buy. Went with this for the amazon recommendation. I had it for about 3 weeks and burnt out the motor. I used it everyday making smoothies from frozen fruits/veggie mix. It worked well and pureed the hell out of it, but struggles with larger frozen pieces. I think I just over worked it. So depending on what you use it for, it may be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this exclusively for smoothies so far, and it’s been great. The only (small) issue I’ve had is that frozen strawberries don’t always get blended completely, but this only happens about 20% of the time, and even then it’s just one piece of (delicious) strawberry in an otherwise perfect smoothie. I can’t really complain. I love the whole concept of the one-serving blender vs a standard blender - being able to blend all the smoothie ingredients directly in the cup I’m going to drink out of is awesome. I appreciate being able to take it to go. It’s also super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: This review is not for the machine itself
customer_reviews.text: This review is not for the machine as the machine is great. I just wanted to highlight that this particular set only comes with one blade. It does not come with a flat blade which is necessary for grinding or a cross blade. Please beware while purchasing this set. Still it is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ratings Man

customer_reviews.title: Updated— Great until it breaks after only a few uses!!!!  Don’t get it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product until it stopped working after a few weeks. I followed the instructions but it always had this slight smell of burning plastic. Today I put in a half banana, yogurt, 3 frozen strawberries, a bit of almond milk and protein powder....started to whiz it up and it just stopped. I e let it rest. I’ve cleaned it out. Nothing. Busted. Waste of money. Update — I tried it one more time a few hours later and it worked. Maybe there is a heat mechanism that automatically shuts it off? No idea. But it was still pretty frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Shmave

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend ice.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to upgrade from Oster MyBlend to a magic bullet. However, this device is incapable of blending ice into my smoothie. Had significantly less power at a higher price. Good customer service though— only used once and was able to return.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the comments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make protein shakes in the morning. I read the reviews about it struggling with ice, but didn't think much of it because I have a machine that makes the ice pellets (I feel like those are easier to blend up...). I've used it once, and this little thing really struggled. I mean, it's a nice product for the price, and I think I can make it work for my needs, but it's not very powerful at all. So, if you're planning to blend frozen fruit, make protein shakes or really blend any difficult product, this is probably not the best product to purchase. It would probably be better to invest in something stronger
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Has become on of my most used kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.text: It chops nuts, it blends fruit, it is super quite and I can wash all the pieces in less than 3 minutes. It is so quite I can run it at night when the kids go to bed. The only thing people need to be aware of, is the hot electric motor smell. I work with electric motors everyday, and the smell is fine and normal for the hard start/stop 110v motors. I can see how it would freak out some of the older, more cautious people in the world. I recommend it to everyone, My dad and best friend have both already bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through 2 of these in the last year - motor burn out. The first lasted about a year, the second lasted about 8 months. We use it pretty frequently, not daily but several times a week my sons will make their protein shakes and occasionally a frozen fruit smoothie. We've also had issues with some of the lids leaking. It's sad that so many products are made so poorly now but it keeps the companies in business so I guess 'worse is better' is the common mantra? So, overall, I wouldn't recommend this product unless you plan to replace it every 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Our origina lmagic bullet blender finally died after 8 years of abuse. I was worried about the watts because the "nutribullet" is higher wattage, but we have not had any problems. My kids love putting extra ice in all of their smoothies and this blender chews through it with ease. Love the smoothie lid that was included too, my daughter makes smoothies in the morning before school and this helps her take it out of the house without making a mess. Glad that my replacement magic bullet was under $40 bucks. Hopefully this one lasts just as long as its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Cold items only
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could make bulletproof coffee while on tour (didn’t want to pack a large blender), but it can’t handle heat. It’s fine for smoothies, grinding coffee beans for a French press, etc., but hot liquids & solids (tried to whip sweet potatoes, too) create pressure and it leaks and/or explodes in seconds. The book has coffee recipes, but they involve iced or “cooled” coffee. The bulletproof recipe says to use cool coffee, then microwave it. That separates the oils - so what’s the point of blending?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like my last magic bullet
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations. I had an older magic bullet, that has been with me for probably 10 years. I am having some issues with it, as my kids are old enough now to start making smoothies, but don't always get the lid on correctly, so we have leaks that go into the blender motor. so i needed another magic bullet. This one is not as good as my last magic bullet. I'm not sure what has happened. but i like my older one better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Awful don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my magic bullet for about 6 weeks and I’m VERY disappointed. It worked great at first but this last week it will hardly blend anything that’s not a liquid. I put frozen bananas in my shakes and now all of a sudden it won’t blend them up. Also there is a weird smell that comes from the base when using it. Kind likes chemical type smell. This was a waste of my money and is now going to be trash since I can’t return it 😒 and I can’t even use it for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one we've ordered. We have one, my mom has one and she brought one to Taiwan to give to my grandma. We have a regular blender and used it rarely because it was so difficult to clean all the gunk at the bottom but this magic bullet is super easy to clean! you just unscrew everything and rinse it away and scrub sometimes when needed. It mixes well and cleans easily. We use it at least once a week for smoothies or sometimes we blend the food for our baby and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Nykerz

customer_reviews.title: Buy warranty
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get a warranty. Only had it a few months and didn’t even use it much and it stooped working.
customer_reviews.author: S.Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for individual servings
customer_reviews.text: To be perfectly honest I got this to make margaritas because it's summer and the kids are home all hopped up on popcicles and let's face it, Mama needs a little grown up refresher too. Some of the reviews had me sceptical, but I decided to pull the trigger and give it a shot. It has not disappointed me. It blends my mixed drinks perfectly. Ice is no problem and frozen strawberries? Why yes they are easy for this little wonder machine. No longer do I need to get the giant blender dirty, the individual cups are perfect and go right into the dishwasher. It is noisy but what blender isn't?
customer_reviews.author: LessThanJess

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY !!!! I made mistake by ignoring reviews
customer_reviews.text: Worst built product ever. Bought it just 2 months back , hardly ever used and now its making noise like it is grinding stones. Blending for banana is also not working. They cover warranty but ask you to pay for shipping which is almost 10-20% of this product. I should not have trusted this brand over bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Purna

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time today and it’s wonderful. I made a smoothie with frozen fruit. Just make sure you a lot of whatever milk you choose so it can blend well. I love that it comes with a travel cup and I can throw my metal straw in it and become a VISCO girl. Worth the price, my moms loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Works for some things, but really only works for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for some things, but really only works for extremely liquid'y stuff. If you try to make guacamole in this you'll get mashed avocado served on top of chunked avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give a good review because my bullet was defective... from the 1st time I used it. It smelled like the motor was burning... and the blades was barely spinning. I tried a few different times before I returned it for a replacement. I hope the next one is much better
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N. Bethune

customer_reviews.title: Happy again
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the first one I wore out. I love that I can fix a shake on the go and it doesn't take that long or that much work. Get ya one if you want something that fits a busy schedule without having to mess up a big blender. You can even get a larger cup specially FOR this blender. Now, THAT I was REALLY happy about 'cause the regular glass that comes with it wasn't always large enough to satisfy me. Now.....I can be satisfied! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: NC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Black discharge from blender blade piece.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this blender. It was purchased August of 2019. It worked beautifully for the rest of August and all of September, being used 8-10 times per week. By October it produced a black liquid that looks like ink. It came out the backside of the blender attachment and into my smoothie. This renders it useless as a unit as well as all accessories. It’s past time to send back through Amazon. Would like to know what recourse there is with this. Our last bullet lasted about 15 years. This one two months. I gave two stars because it was great for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B. Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: This newer cheaper version suuuuuucks and is not worth your $40
customer_reviews.text: I’m a former fan of the magic bullet and have used mine for years until it finally died. This newer version is a WASTE. The price reduction ($40 instead of $100) is obvious. This is basically a pencil sharpener. It has now power, can’t grind seeds, burns out and shuts off quickly, and emits bad odors after just a few seconds. I’m hoping they’ll take the return. Clearly time for me to me to move on to a more powerful and expensive bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Noel Groves Wintergreen Botanicals LLC

customer_reviews.title: We are having smoothies every day
customer_reviews.text: After I received this, we are adding smoothies to our breakfast almost every day. I also use it to grind avocado seeds - the end product wasn’t as refined as a coffee grinder but it is good enough. Because it’s so much easier to clean compared to the coffee grinder, I can look pass it. And egg shell, too. It scratched the lid (where the blades are attached), but it happened when I pulsed the toasted bread in my Ninja Blender. I gave my Ninja Blender away because it takes too much space and I only use the blend for small things, like smoothies, basil pesto...
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Another gadget I shouldn’t have purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Ninja that I accidentally broke and I am so disappointed. I use it to make smoothies and açaí bowls, and found that it works exactly like the Proctor Silex on-the-go smoothie maker, which I find to be low in power and takes a lot of time and bottle-shaking to get to blend all the ingredients. This is even inferior to that machine as it holds much less and is more expensive. I should’ve just purchased a full sized blender for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as I remember!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these 10 years ago and it was amazing. I recently purchased this so my daughter could make some smoothies, however it has a very hard time blending frozen fruit...even if you chop it into little pieces. I tried using it as a food processor and found that didn't work well either. It does make an ok banana smoothie if you use half of a ripe banana and almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great personal blender
customer_reviews.text: Great littler blender for personal use. I’ve used it for smoothies and to blend spices (frozen coconut with Indian spices) so far. Haven’t used ice yet, which per other reviews can be an issue. Really simple to use and easy cleanup. There’s really only one function, no way to change settings. It looks like the main thing is to blend in short spurts otherwise the elements can overheat. For my purposes, works well
customer_reviews.author: Abby J

customer_reviews.title: Serious bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I've been using shaker bottles for years for protein shakes and the like, and they really don't work well (unless you enjoy lumpy beverages). I have a vitamix, but that's seriously overkill when you just want to make a quick protein shake after a workout. This product is seriously worth every penny. Super easy to use, great form factor, well designed, easy to clean, and does exactly what I want it to do with no fuss. I've not tried anything more complex that a protein shake in this yet, but I suspect it could handle quite a lot more besides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a terrible product (and I like the original Bullet)
customer_reviews.text: They've somehow managed to make this product cheaper than the prior generation which was inexpensive but surprisingly effective. The new Bullet has smaller blades which seem to affect its ability to make something as simple as a fruit smoothie with strawberries, banana, and orange (of which only the strawberries are frozen). I have to turn it on and literally shake it up and down to get the fruit to hit the blades and blend well. Even keeping in mind the relatively inexpensive cost, this is a terrible product (and I like the original Bullet). Hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Sad and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressive overall 😕. I use this for smoothies....I don't even use ice and this thing (audibly) loses power during use. I have had this only 1 month and I have already had a moment where the thing literally just wouldn't work....plug it in, fill the container with strawberries and bananas and some shake powder. Pour in some juice or milk or whatever. *click*......hmmm, let's try this again...*click* NOTHING IN THIS CONTAINER IS FROZEN.....I think I'll look for a different brand of item.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Jones

customer_reviews.title: STOPS WORKING
customer_reviews.text: STOPPED WORKING I used this to blend my baby’s food . So really light use for about 3months and it stopped working :/ unfortunately the warranty amazon covered was only till 3 montha and I wasn’t eligible for a return or replacement . It’s junk now . I’m still searching for a reliable mixer
customer_reviews.author: Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love our bullet but it struggled with frozen strawberries plus frozen bananas.
customer_reviews.author: Always skeptical

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS.. DON'T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DANGEROUS!! Worked perfectly for 1 and a half month before a black greasy substance started leaking from the blade. I understand grease makes the mechanical parts move smoothly but who in the world puts grease on the parts that touches food? We are using this to make fruit purees for my infant.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: This little blender has more than paid for itself...
customer_reviews.text: It blends well. The kids are loving the freedom of making their own slushies with water flavor packs/ice/water... Saves a bundle when we used to splurge at Sonic for our slush cravings! And they can each make their own, AWESOME! It is loud, so no blending while other people are punching the snooze button on the alarm clock. BOO! But it seems to be sturdy enough, has already more than paid for itself. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: Hardly chopped anything to make a couple smoothies and frozen drinks. Too loud for being small product. Also used it 5 times and the motor burned up with only 3 ice cubes in it. Not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Great, but ice can be a problem.
customer_reviews.text: I love making smoothies on this thing, although I would say it doesn't seem to be able to crush ice very well, so I tend not to put too many Ice cubes in or I will put in crushed iced instead. I have had fun experimenting with it and though I don't use it regularly (I use it like 3 times a week). It has been a month now and it has hold up well for now. I have seen reviews complaining about durability so I will be on the lookout for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Martinez Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: Product quit working after less than a month and using it probably 10 times. The motor won't spin the blades when the bullet is properly engaged. Very dissatisfied and of course two day after the ability to possibly return.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you like to make smoothies. Easy to clean, doesn't take up a lot of space, powerful enough to handle ice cubes or ice cream. My only complaint is that the sizes of the blending containers included are all too small if you want to make something for 2 people to share.
customer_reviews.author: Monster

customer_reviews.title: Died after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this blender, but it died after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana

customer_reviews.title: Was great for 2-3 weeks, then started leaking
customer_reviews.text: Hi Seller, I'm not a reviewer, wanted to let you and everyone know about my issues: Background - I use the blender for only juices or smoothies (No ice or hard blending). Issue - Blender has started leaking into the rotor assembly. I can see liquid lining in the bottom of the rotor which is attached to the stationary mixer. This started happening since start of Jan 2019, I kept ignoring it (My fault). But today, I could taste the rotor oil/fumes in my juice. Proposed solution - Please replace or refund me. I can't use the current product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dhruva Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Product is crappy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. Seems unable to blend properly. Only seems to blend half of the fruits i put in the cup. I fill it halfway with fruits and then add almond milk to blend. Its also super noisy so I cannot blend early in the morning before my roommate is awake.
customer_reviews.author: June Anne B

customer_reviews.title: Blending Bonanza
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter who makes breakfast smoothies for my granddaughter. She used her first Magic Bullet until it finally died and was so happy to get a new one. This works great and very fast and is really quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sooo small
customer_reviews.text: The cups ended up being a lot smaller than I expected :/ it takes forever to blend up my smoothies because I need to keep mixing and adding once everything gets liquified but I guess that’s on me, I didn’t pay attention to the size before buying. Besides that, I was a little disappointed at how poorly it grinds small ice cubes. The blade part is also kinda hard to wash and you can’t put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: love that it's small, and comes w/ plenty of optional cups, but not so many that they are a hassle to store - and plenty of lids if you make too much - we have done smoothies (works great), but mostly make Keto pancakes - every weekend - and it really blends up the cream cheese well - wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3 teenage girls!

customer_reviews.title: What am I supposed to use this for?
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make a smoothie this morning with frozen fruit and almond milk, however all I got was frozen fruit and almond milk. The blades aren't sharp enough to blend the fruit! What am I supposed to use this for if it can't cut ice? Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

product_meta.title: Magic Bullet Blender, Small, Silver, 11 Piece Set
product_meta.description: Magic Bullet 13-Piece Set Blender & Food Processor for Kitchen with Over 40 million Bullets sold! Make it fast by keeping it simple. Does any job in 10 seconds or Less! Hi-speed blender & mixer. 10 second recipe book included. Like your personal kitchen food processor & blender assistant. Do it all with hi-speed blender & mixer system. Chop, Mix, Blend, Whip, Grind, and Mince. Handy versatile and easy to use, the Magic Bullet Blender & Food Processor takes up minimal counter space while showcasing maximum speed and versatility. With its unique design and compact size, the Magic Bullet Blender & Food Processor chops, mixes, blends, whips, grinds and more in less time than it takes to assemble standard kitchen appliances. Make the perfect smoothies and milkshakes, frozen cocktails, and pureed soups super easily! And with a wide array of dishwasher-safe attachments, clean-up is as easy as it gets. The secret to the Magic Bullet's time-saving efficiency is its specially designed blade and unique bullet shape. These features work together to quickly and forcefully circulate food back into the Cyclonic Cutting Zone, allowing the Magic Bullet to do virtually any food prep task in seconds.
feature_bullets: 13 Piece Blender Set: Includes Blender, Additional Blender Cups, Blades, Recipe Book & More
The Magic Bullet chops, mixes, blends, whips, grinds and more. Cups are made out of high-impact plastic
Effortlessly create your favorite meals and snacks like smoothies, omelets, sauces and dips. 250 Watts high-torque power base
Included Recipe Book gets you started making quick, easy, and delicious dishes from appetizers to desserts. Add 1/2 cup water for smooth blend for vegetables

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars19,301 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
